title: Daft Punk - TRON Legacy Soundtrack [Complete Edition] - HD
description: Do you want a Mouse pad for 0.99$? http://pastebin.com/ZijWELWn (I've already ordered one). I'm a college student. I need coffee, buy me one? http://bit.ly/1qANTrl I do not drink coffee, Who am I kidding? ////////////////////////////////////////Â­/////// This video is the full soundtrack of the film TRON Legacy composed by Daft Punk. It contains all tracks from the movie including bonus tracks and movie score. It took me a long time to prepare this video because I had problems with Sony Vegas. And after rendering, the file size of the video was 2.07 GB, and it took me 7 hours to upload it. Tracklist: Disc 1: 1. Overture (0:00) 2. The Grid (2:28) 3. The Son of Flynn (4:04) 4. Recognizer (5:40) 5. Armory (8:18) 6. Arena (10:20) 7. Rinzler (11:53) 8. The Game Has Changed (14:11) 9. Outlands (17:37) 10. Adagio For TRON (20:19) 11. Nocturne (24:30) 12. End of Line (26:13) 13. Derezzed (28:49) 14. Fall (30:33) 15. Solar Sailer (31:56) 16. Rectifier (34:38) 17. Disc Wars (36:52) 18. C.L.U. (41:04) 19. Arrival (45:43) 20. Flynn Lives (47:44) 21. TRON Legacy (End Titles) (51:06) 22. Finale (54:24) Disc 2: 1. Encom Part I (58:47) 2. Encom Part II (1:02:39) 3. Round One (1:04:57) 4. Castor (1:06:37) 5. Reflections (1:08:57) iTunes bonus tracks 23. "Father and Son" (1:11:40) 24. "Outlands, Part II" (1:14:55) Amazon MP3 bonus track 23. "Sea of Simulation" (1:17:52) Nokia Ovi Store bonus track 23. "Sunrise Prelude" (1:20:32) Score: 1. Trailer opening (1:23:22) 2. Flynn remembers (1:26:25) 3. City Reveal (1:29:28) 4. Victory (1:31:30) 5. Battle (1:33:54) 6. Alan Bradley's Message (1:35:17) I just made this video for listening. If you see any ads of any kind is not my fault. I do not pretend to win money with this upload.
